title: Representation of impulse exerted on ball by floor

content.question: A 2 kg ball collides with the floor at an angle ùúΩ and rebounds at the same angle and speed as shown above. Which of the following vectors represents the impulse exerted on the ball by the floor?

choices.label: Five answer choices are shown. Choice A is an arrow pointing straight down.
Five answer choices are shown. Choice B is an arrow pointing down and to the right.
Five answer choices are shown. Choice C is an arrow pointing straight to the right.
Five answer choices are shown. Choice D is an arrow pointing up and to the right. Choice E is an arrow pointing straight up.
Five answer choices are shown. Choice E is an arrow pointing straight up.

content.answer: Five answer choices are shown. Choice E is an arrow pointing straight up.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
